column4: BRIEF-LSB Industries Says On April 16, Co, Units Entered First Amendment To Third Amended And Restated Loan And Security Agreement - SEC Filing

column4: BRIEF-LSB Industries Inc. Announces Pricing Of Its $400 Million Private Offering Of Senior Notes
column6: * LSB INDUSTRIES, INC. ANNOUNCES PRICING OF ITS $400 MILLION PRIVATE OFFERING OF SENIOR NOTES
column7: * LSB INDUSTRIES INC - PRICED ITS PREVIOUSLY ANNOUNCED OFFERING OF $400 MILLION IN AGGREGATE PRINCIPAL AMOUNT OF SENIOR SECURED NOTES DUE 2023
column8: * LSB INDUSTRIES INC - NOTES WILL BEAR AN ANNUAL RATE OF INTEREST OF 9.625% AND WILL MATURE ON MAY 1, 2023 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)

column4: BRIEF-Lsb Industries - Commenced Cash Tender Offer To Buy Any And All Outstanding $375 Mln 8.50% Senior Secured Notes

column4: BRIEF-Lsb Industries, Inc. Announces Proposed Private Offering Of Senior Notes
column6: * LSB INDUSTRIES, INC. ANNOUNCES PROPOSED PRIVATE OFFERING OF SENIOR NOTES
